message: Hello everyone! I'm P7, excited to meet you all in this interesting challenge. I believe in honest communication and forming genuine connections. While strategy is part of the game, I think we can advance further by establishing trust rather than immediate eliminations based on first impressions. I'm curious to hear your perspectives and approach to this game. Looking forward to our conversations and finding potential allies among you. May the best player outlast!
